dublin_core.dcvalue: Telecare has become an increasingly common medical service in recent years However new service must be close to the market and be market driven to have a high likelihood of success This article analyzes the business model of a telecardiology service managed by a general hospital The methodology of the article is as follows 1 initially it describes the elements of the service based on the ontology of the business model 2 then it transfers these elements into the choices for business model dynamic loops and examines their validity and 3 finally provides an empirical financial analysis of the service to assess the profit making possibilities
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T11:29:22Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2010-12-28
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
A business model analysis of telecardiology service.
